name: calm clusters spa washcloth
notes:
pamper time never looked so pretty! this gorgeously textured and lightweight washcloth has both looks and practicality. it’s light texture is perfect for gentle facial cleansing and light exfoliation too.

this pattern is part of the calm clusters spa set with 4 patterns (all free to view on the website). 

sized as an 8” x 8” (20.3cm x 20.3cm) square, and is easily adapted for other sizes should you want a bigger/smaller facecloth. it also includes an optional border.

**skill level:** easy

**recommended yarn:** any soft cotton #3 dk weight yarn:  approx. 69yds/63m (1.06oz/30g) without border, 80.4yds/73.5m (1.24oz/35g) with border.

**hooks:** us size 7 (4.5mm), us size h (5.0mm)
